name: Tatiana
description:
St. Petersburg, Russia, 1876

               Thanks to the innovation of the day’s greatest scientific minds, the invention of singing androids has taken the music world by storm. Built by the finest engineers, these Singing Dolls have enchanted audiences around the globe. Perfectly mimicking the soul and complexity of the human voice, their music enraptures the hearts of audiences everywhere. 

               Enter Peter. An elderly man who has outlived everyone in his family, he is simply waiting for his time to come. In the meantime, he makes himself useful by maintaining and repairing the Singing Dolls.

               One night, Peter discovers a terrible truth. And realizes there is more to Tatiana, the lead singer, than meets the eye.

---

Tatiana was made for the Scream Machine 2020 Jam.

---

Credits

  • Original soundtrack - Fabien Merten
